io.github.robolib.nettable

Class NTConnectionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.robolib.nettable.NTConnectionAdapter

  • public class NTConnectionAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that adapts messages from a client to the server
